articles.title: Appendix cancer on the rise among US millennials, new study finds
articles.description: Cases of appendix cancer are increasing among young people in the US, especially millennials. Researchers warn lifestyle and environmental changes could be driving the rise of this rare cancer.
articles.content:
From breast and colon to stomach and pancreatic cancers, doctors are now seeing more cases in people under the age of 50. A new study adds another surprising cancer to that list: appendix cancer.
While it remains extremely rare, appendix cancer is st... [3370 chars]

articles.title: Apple Intelligence took a backseat at WWDC 2025 but it is still getting a few updates
articles.description: Apple didn’t lead with artificial intelligence at WWDC 2025, but it has still added a handful of new Apple Intelligence features that are worth taking a note of.
articles.content: Artificial intelligence may be the buzzword of the year, but at Apple’s Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2025, it took a quieter role. While flashy design changes like the new Liquid Glass interface grabbed most of the attention, Apple still in... [4046 chars]

articles.title: Why is a moon’s crater named after illustrious Bengali scientist Sisir Kumar Mitra?
articles.description: Sisir Kumar Mitra was a the father of ionospheric science in India
articles.content: Remember India’s historic Chandrayaan 2 mission in 2019, the first-ever attempt to land a robotic lander on the moon’s south pole? It was a daring project targeting a region full of craters and rugged terrain—one few countries had dared to explore. T... [3693 chars]

articles.title: Why Trump’s Deployment of Military in California Is So Controversial
articles.description: President Donald Trump ordered the California National Guard on June 7 to dispatch at least 2,000 soldiers to the Los Angeles area as thousands of people demonstrating against immigration raids clashed with security forces. After vandalism and violence broke out, the Pentagon escalated the federal response by also mobilizing 700 active-duty Marines.

articles.title: 2025 full moon: How to watch June's favourite Strawberry Moon
articles.description: The Strawberry Moon, named for the strawberry harvest season, will rise on June 10 and peak on June 11 at 3:44 a.m. ET.
articles.content: The Strawberry Moon is set to rise on the night of Tuesday, June 10, and will glow into the early morning of Wednesday, 11 June. Notably, it will be the lowest-hanging full moon seen in nearly two decades. On June 10, the Strawberry Moon will rise, r... [1905 chars]

articles.title: From 20 cigarettes a day for 55 years to finally quitting: ‘I took it up, thinking I was the big man’
articles.description: Mick Staunton and his wife Olivia tried to stop smoking on numerous occasions, but knew they needed support to stop for good
articles.content:
For 55 years, Mick Staunton smoked more than 20 cigarettes a day. His wife, Olivia, wasn’t far behind him, having taken up smoking 46 years ago and smoking at least 10 a day ever since.
